00022 /* function RecordJrn
00023  * Purpose : Record an entry in the selected journal
00024  * 
00025  * parm : 
00026  *      - p_dossier dossier id
00027  *      - p_user user id
00028  *      - p_jrn selected journal
00029  * gen :
00030  *      - none
00031  * return:
00032  *      - none
00033  *
00034  */ 
00035 function RecordJrn($p_dossier,$p_user,$p_jrn,$p_MaxDeb,$p_MaxCred,$p_array = null,$p_update=0)
00036 {
00037   include_once("postgres.php");
00038   include_once("preference.php");
00039 
00040   echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"RecordJrn($p_dossier,$p_user,$p_jrn,$p_MaxDeb,$p_MaxCred,$p_array,$p_update)");
00041   for ( $i = 0; $i < $p_MaxDeb; $i++) {
00042       ${"e_class_deb$i"}=0;
00043       ${"e_mont_deb$i"}=0;
00044   }
00045   for ( $i = 0; $i < $p_MaxCred; $i++) {
00046       ${"e_class_cred$i"}=0;
00047       ${"e_mont_cred$i"}=0;
00048   }
00049   $cn=DbConnect($p_dossier);
00050     // userPref contient la periode par default
00051     $userPref=GetUserPeriode($cn,$p_user);
00052     list ($l_date_start,$l_date_end)=GetPeriode($cn,$userPref);
00053     $e_op_rem=substr($l_date_start,2,8);
00054 
00055   if ( $p_array == null ) {
00056     $e_op_date="01";
00057     $e_comment="";
00058     $e_rapt="";
00059     $e_ech="";
00060     $e_sum_deb=0;
00061     $e_sum_cred=0;
00062   } else {
00063     foreach ( $p_array as $n=>$e) {
00064       ${"e_$n"}= $e;
00065   }
00066   }
00067   /* Get Jrn's properties */
00068   $l_line=GetJrnProperty($cn,$p_jrn);
00069   if ( $l_line == null ) return;
00070   echo '<DIV class="redcontent">';
00071   echo '<FORM NAME="encoding" ACTION="enc_jrn.php" METHOD="POST">';
00072 
00073   printf ('<H2 class="info"> %s %s </H2>',$l_line['jrn_def_name'],$l_line['jrn_def_code']);
00074 
00075   echo "<INPUT TYPE=HIDDEN NAME=\"MaxDeb\" VALUE=\"$p_MaxDeb\">";
00076   echo "<INPUT TYPE=HIDDEN NAME=\"MaxCred\" VALUE=\"$p_MaxCred\">";
00077   echo 'Date : <INPUT TYPE="TEXT" NAME="op_date" VALUE="'.
00078     $e_op_date.'" SIZE="4">'.
00079     $e_op_rem;
00080 
00081   // Comment
00082   echo '<br><SPAN>Comment  = <INPUT TYPE="TEXT" SIZE="70" NAME="comment" VALUE="'.$e_comment.'"></span>';
00083 
00084   // Chargement comptes disponibles
00085   if ( strlen(trim ($l_line['jrn_def_class_deb']) ) > 0 ) {
00086     $valid_deb=split(" ",$l_line['jrn_def_class_deb']);
00087 
00088     // Creation query
00089     $SqlDeb="select pcm_val,pcm_lib from tmp_pcmn where ";
00090     foreach ( $valid_deb as $item_deb) {
00091       if ( strlen (trim($item_deb))) {
00092         echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"l_line[jrn_def_class_deb] $l_line[jrn_def_class_deb] item_deb $item_deb");
00093         if ( strstr($item_deb,"*") == true ) {
00094           $item_deb=strtr($item_deb,"*","%");
00095           $Sql=" pcm_val like '$item_deb' or";
00096         } else {
00097           $Sql=" pcm_val = '$item_deb' or";
00098         }
00099         $SqlDeb=$SqlDeb.$Sql;
00100       }
00101     }
00102     $SqlDeb = substr($SqlDeb,0,strlen($SqlDeb)-2)." order by pcm_val::text";
00103   } else
00104     {
00105       $SqlDeb="select pcm_val,pcm_lib from tmp_pcmn  order by pcm_val::text";
00106     }
00107   echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"SqlDeb $SqlDeb");
00108   $Res=ExecSql($cn,$SqlDeb);
00109   $Count=pg_NumRows($Res);
00110 
00111   for ( $i=0;$i<$Count;$i++) {
00112     $l2_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00113     $lib=substr($l2_line['pcm_lib'],0,35);
00114     $poste [$l2_line['pcm_val']]= $lib;
00115   }
00116 
00117   echo "<TABLE>";
00118   echo '<TR><TD><H2 class="info"> débit </H2></TD></TR>';
00119   for ( $i=0;$i < $p_MaxDeb;$i++) {
00120     echo "<tr>";
00121     echo "<TD>";
00122     printf ('<SELECT NAME="class_deb%d">',$i);
00123     foreach ( $poste as $key => $value){ 
00124       $selected="";
00125       if ( ${"e_class_deb$i"} == $key ) $selected="SELECTED";
00126       $a=sprintf('<OPTION VALUE="%s" %s >%s - % .40s',
00127              $key,
00128              $selected,
00129              $key,
00130              $value);
00131       echo $a;
00132     }
00133     echo "</SELECT>";
00134     printf ('</TD>');
00135 
00136     printf('<TD> Montant :<INPUT TYPE="TEXT" id="mont_deb%d" NAME="mont_deb%d" VALUE="%s" onChange="CheckTotal()"></TD>',
00137             $i,$i,${"e_mont_deb$i"},$i);
00138     echo "</tr>";
00139 
00140   }
00141   // Total debit
00142    echo '<TR><TD>';
00143    echo 'Total ';
00144    echo '</TD><TD>';
00145    echo '<input type="TEXT" NAME="sum_deb" VALUE="'.$e_sum_deb.'" onChange="CheckTotal()">';
00146    echo '</TD></TR>';
00147 if ( $p_update == 0 )  echo "<TR><TD> <INPUT TYPE=\"SUBMIT\" VALUE=\"+ de line\" NAME=\"add_line_deb\"></TD></TR>";
00148 
00149 
00150 
00151 
00152   echo '<TR><TD><H2 class="info"> crédit </H2> </TD></TR>';
00153   // Chargement comptes disponibles
00154   if ( strlen(trim ($l_line['jrn_def_class_cred']) ) > 0 ) {
00155     $valid_cred=split(" ",$l_line['jrn_def_class_cred']);
00156 
00157     // Creation query
00158     $SqlCred="select pcm_val,pcm_lib from tmp_pcmn where ";
00159     foreach ( $valid_cred as $item_cred) {
00160       if ( strlen (trim($item_cred))) {
00161         echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"l_line[jrn_def_class_cred] $l_line[jrn_def_class_cred] item_cred $item_cred");
00162         if ( strstr($item_cred,"*") == true ) {
00163           $item_cred=strtr($item_cred,"*","%");
00164           $Sql=" pcm_val like '$item_cred' or";
00165         } else {
00166           $Sql=" pcm_val = '$item_cred' or";
00167         }
00168         $SqlCred=$SqlCred.$Sql;
00169       }
00170     }
00171     $SqlCred = substr($SqlCred,0,strlen($SqlCred)-2)." order by pcm_val::text" ;
00172   } else
00173     {
00174       $SqlCred="select pcm_val,pcm_lib from tmp_pcmn  order by pcm_val::text";
00175     }
00176   echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"SqlCred $SqlCred");
00177   $Res=ExecSql($cn,$SqlCred);
00178   $Count=pg_NumRows($Res);
00179 
00180 
00181   for ( $i=0;$i<$Count;$i++) {
00182     $l2_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00183     $lib=substr($l2_line['pcm_lib'],0,35);
00184     $poste_c[$l2_line['pcm_val']]=$lib;
00185   }
00186   for ( $i=0;$i < $p_MaxCred;$i++) {
00187     echo "<tr>";
00188     echo "<TD>";
00189     printf ('<SELECT NAME="class_cred%d">',$i);
00190     foreach ( $poste_c as $key => $value){ 
00191       $selected="";
00192       if ( ${"e_class_cred$i"} == $key ) $selected="SELECTED";
00193       $a=sprintf('<OPTION VALUE="%s" %s >%s - % .40s',
00194              $key,
00195              $selected,
00196              $key,
00197              $value);
00198       echo $a;
00199     }
00200         
00201     echo "</SELECT>";
00202     echo "</TD>";
00203 
00204     printf ('<TD> Montant :<INPUT TYPE="TEXT" id="mont_cred%d" NAME="mont_cred%d" VALUE="%s" onChange="CheckTotal()"></TD>',
00205             $i,$i,${"e_mont_cred$i"});
00206     echo "</tr>";
00207 
00208   }
00209   // Total Credit
00210   echo '<TR><TD>';
00211   echo 'Total';
00212   echo '</TD><TD>';
00213   echo '<input type="TEXT" NAME="sum_cred" VALUE="'.$e_sum_cred.'" onChange="CheckTotal()">';
00214   echo '</TD></TR>';
00215   echo "<TR><TD> <INPUT TYPE=\"SUBMIT\" VALUE=\"+ de line\" NAME=\"add_line_cred\"></TD></TR>";
00216   if ( isset ($_GET["PHPSESSID"]) ) {
00217     $sessid=$_GET["PHPSESSID"];
00218   }
00219   else {
00220     $sessid=$_POST["PHPSESSID"];
00221   }
00222 
00223   $search='<INPUT TYPE="BUTTON" VALUE="Cherche" OnClick="SearchJrn(\''.$sessid."','rapt')\">";
00224   echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"search $search");
00225   // To avoid problem with unknown variable
00226   if ( ! isset ($e_rapt) ) {
00227         $e_rapt="";
00228   }
00229 
00230   echo '<TR><TD colspan="2">
00231          rapprochement : <INPUT TYPE="TEXT" name="rapt" value="'.$e_rapt.'">'.$search.'</TD></TR>';
00232   echo "</TABLE>";
00233 
00234   // To avoid problem with unknown variable
00235   if ( ! isset ($e_comment) ) {
00236         $e_comment="";
00237   }
00238  
00239 
00240 
00241   if ( $p_update==0) {
00242     echo '<input type="submit" Name="add_record" Value="Enregistre">';
00243   } else {
00244     echo '<input type="submit" Name="update_record" Value="Enregistre">';
00245   }
00246    echo '<input type="reset" Value="Efface">';
00247 
00248    // To avoid problem with unknown variable
00249     if ( ! isset ($e_sum_deb) ) {
00250                  $e_sum_deb=0;
00251     }
00252 
00253    // To avoid problem with unknown variable
00254      if ( ! isset ($e_sum_cred) ) {
00255                  $e_sum_cred=0;
00256       }
00257 
00258 
00259    echo '<SPAN ID="diff"></SPAN>';
00260   echo "</FORM>";
00261   echo '</DIV>';
00262   
00263 }
00264 /* function UpdateJrn
00265  * Purpose : Display the form to UPDATE account operation
00266  *          
00267  * parm : 
00268  *      - p_dossier
00269  *      - p_jrn
00270  *      - p_MaxDeb number of debit line
00271  *      - p_MaxCred "     "  credit "
00272  *"     - p_array array containing the others datas
00273  * gen :
00274  *      - none
00275  * return:
00276  *      - none
00277  *
00278  */ 
00279  function UpdateJrn($p_cn,$p_jr_id)
00280 {
00281   echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"function UpdateJrn");
00282 
00283   $l_array=GetDataJrnJrId($p_cn,$p_jr_id);
00284   if ( $l_array == null ) {
00285     echo_error ("Not data found for UpdateJrn p_jr_id = $p_jr_id");
00286     return ;
00287   }
00288   // Javascript
00289   $r=JS_VIEW_JRN_MODIFY;
00290 
00291   // Build the form
00292   $col_vide="<TD></TD>";
00293   for ( $i =0 ; $i < sizeof($l_array); $i++) {
00294     $content=$l_array[$i] ;
00295 
00296       // for the first line
00297       if ( $i == 0 ) {
00298         $r.="<TABLE>";
00299         $r.="<TR>";
00300         // Date
00301         $r.="<TD>";
00302         $r.=$content['jr_date'];
00303         $r.="</TD>";
00304         // for upload document we need the grpt_id   
00305         $r.='<Input type="hidden" name="jr_grpt_id" value="'.$content['jr_grpt_id'].'">';
00306 
00307         // comment can be changed
00308         $r.="<TD>";
00309         $r.='<INPUT TYPE="TEXT" name="comment" value="';
00310         $r.=$content['jr_comment'];
00311         $r.='" SIZE="25">';
00312         $r.="</TD>";
00313 
00314         // Internal
00315         $r.="<TD>";
00316         $r.=$content['jr_internal'];
00317         $r.="</TD>";
00318 
00319         if ( $content['jrn_def_type'] == 'ACH' or 
00320              $content['jrn_def_type'] == 'VEN' )
00321           {
00322             // Is Paid
00323             $r.="<TD>";
00324             $check=( $content['jr_rapt'] != null )?"CHECKED":"UNCHECKED";
00325             $r.='<TD>Payé <INPUT TYPE="CHECKBOX" name="is_paid" '.$check.'></TD>';
00326           }
00327         $r.="</TR>";
00328         $r.="</TABLE>";
00329         $r.="<TABLE>";
00330       }
00331       $r.="<TR>";
00332       if ( $content['j_debit'] == 'f' ) $r.=$col_vide;
00333       //      $r.="<TD>".$content['j_debit']."</td>";
00334       
00335       $r.="<TD>".$content['j_poste']."</td>";
00336       if ( $content['j_debit'] == 't' ) $r.=$col_vide;
00337       $r.="<TD>".$content['vw_name']."</td>";
00338       if ( $content['j_debit'] == 'f' ) $r.=$col_vide;
00339       $r.="<TD>".$content['j_montant']."</td>";
00340       $r.="</TR>";
00341 
00342       //    }//     foreach ($l_array[$i]  as $value=>$content) 
00343   }// for ( $i =0 ; $i < sizeof($l_array); $i++) 
00344     $file=new widget("file");
00345     $file->table=1;
00346         //document
00347     $r.='<TD>A effacer <INPUT TYPE="CHECKBOX" name="to_remove" ></TD>';
00348     $r.="<TD>".sprintf('<A class="detail" HREF="show_document.php?jrn=%s&jr_grpt_id=%s">%s</A>',
00349                 $content['jr_id'],
00350                 $content['jr_grpt_id'],
00351                 $content['jr_pj_name'])."</TD>";
00352     $r.="</TR></TABLE>";
00353     $r.="<hr>";
00354     $r.= "<table>"; 
00355     $r.="<TR>".$file->IOValue("pj","","Pièce justificative")."</TR>";
00356     $r.="</table>";
00357     $r.="<hr>";
00358 
00359   $r.="</table>";
00360   $r.="Total ".$content['jr_montant']."<br>";
00361   // show all the related operation
00362   $a=GetConcerned($p_cn,$content['jr_id']);
00363   
00364   if ( $a != null ) {
00365       $r.="<b>Operation concernée</b> <br>";
00366       if ( isset ($_GET["PHPSESSID"]) ) {
00367         $sessid=$_GET["PHPSESSID"];
00368       }
00369       else {
00370         $sessid=$_POST["PHPSESSID"];
00371       }
00372 
00373     $r.= '<div style="margin-left:30px;">';
00374     foreach ($a as $key => $element) {
00375       $r.=sprintf ('%s <INPUT TYPE="BUTTON" VALUE="Détail" onClick="viewDetail(\'%s\',\'%s\')">', 
00376                    GetInternal($p_cn,$element),GetGrpt($p_cn,$element),$sessid);
00377       $r.=sprintf('<INPUT TYPE="button" value="Efface" onClick="dropLink(\'%s\',\'%s\',\'%s\')"><BR>',
00378                   $content['jr_id'],$element,$sessid);
00379     }//for
00380     $r.= "</div>";
00381   }// if ( $a != null ) {
00382 
00383   if ( isset ($_GET["PHPSESSID"]) ) {
00384     $sessid=$_GET["PHPSESSID"];
00385   }
00386   else {
00387     $sessid=$_POST["PHPSESSID"];
00388   }
00389   
00390   $search='<INPUT TYPE="BUTTON" VALUE="Cherche" OnClick="SearchJrn(\''.$sessid."','rapt')\">";
00391 
00392   $r.= '<H2 class="info">rapprochement </H2> 
00393        <INPUT TYPE="TEXT" name="rapt" value="">'.$search;
00394   $r.='<input type="hidden" name="jr_id" value="'.$content['jr_id'].'">';
00395 
00396   //  echo $r;
00397   return $r;
00398 }

00415   }else {

00421 }
00422 /* function CorrectRecord

00424  *

00430  *      - none
00431  *
00432  */ 
00433 function CorrectRecord($p_dossier,$p_user,$p_jrn,$p_MaxDeb,$p_MaxCred,$p_array)
00434 {
00435 
00436    RecordJrn($p_dossier,$p_user,$p_jrn,$p_MaxDeb,$p_MaxCred,$p_array);
00437 }
00438 /* function ViewRecord
00439  * Purpose : View the added operation
00440  * 
00441  * parm : 
00442  *      - p_dossier
00443  *      - p_jrn
00444  *      - p_id
00445  *      - p_MaxDeb
00446  *      - p_MaxCred
00447  *      - p_array
00448  * gen :
00449  *      - none
00450  * return:
00451  *      - none
00452  *
00453  */ 
00454 function ViewRecord ($p_dossier,$p_jrn,$p_id,$p_MaxDeb,$p_MaxCred,$p_array)
00455 {
00456   echo_debug ("ViewRecord : $p_dossier");
00457   echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"function ViewRecord ($p_dossier,$p_jrn,$p_id,$p_MaxCred,$p_MaxDeb,$p_array)");
00458   foreach ( $p_array as $key=>$element) {
00459     ${"e_$key"}=$element;
00460     echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__," e_$key=$element;");
00461 
00462   }
00463   // Get Jrn's Prop
00464   $l_prop=GetJrnProp($p_dossier,$p_jrn);
00465 
00466   include_once("poste.php");
00467   if ( $l_prop == null ) return;
00468   $col_vide="<TD></TD>";
00469   echo '<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER BORDER=1 style="border-style:groove">';
00470   echo '<TR>';
00471   echo "<TD>". $l_prop['jrn_def_name']."(".$l_prop['jrn_def_code'].") </TD>";
00472   echo "<TD> Date : $e_op_date</TD>";
00473   echo "</TR>";
00474   echo "</TABLE>";
00475 
00476 
00477   echo "<table width=600 border=0>";
00478   echo "<TR><TD>operation $p_id</TD></TR>";
00479   for ($i = 0; $i < $p_MaxDeb;$i++) {
00480     //Deb
00481     if ( strlen(trim(${"e_mont_deb$i"})) > 0 && ${"e_mont_deb$i"} > 0 ) {
00482       $class=GetPosteLibelle($p_dossier,${"e_class_deb$i"});
00483 
00484       echo '<TR style="background-color:lightblue"><TD>'.${"e_class_deb$i"}."</TD>$col_vide<TD> $class </TD> <TD>".${"e_mont_deb$i"}."</TD>$col_vide</TR>";
00485     }
00486   }
00487 
00488   // Cred
00489   for ($i = 0; $i < $p_MaxCred;$i++) {
00490     if ( strlen(trim(${"e_mont_cred$i"})) > 0 && ${"e_mont_cred$i"} > 0 ) {
00491       $class=GetPosteLibelle($p_dossier,${"e_class_cred$i"});
00492       
00493       echo '<TR style="background-color:lightgreen;">'.$col_vide.'<TD>'.${"e_class_cred$i"}."</TD><TD> $class </TD>$col_vide <TD>".${"e_mont_cred$i"}."</TD></TR>";
00494     }
00495   }
00496   echo "<TR style=\"background-color:lightgray\">";
00497   echo $col_vide;
00498   echo $col_vide;
00499   echo "<TD align=\"center\"> Total</TD>";
00500   echo "<TD> $e_sum_deb</TD><TD> $e_sum_cred</TD>";
00501   echo "</TABLE>";
00502   // Bouton again
00503   echo '<table align="center">';
00504   echo '<TR><TD class="mtitle">';
00505   echo ' <A class="mtitle" HREF="enc_jrn.php?action=record&max_deb='.$l_prop['jrn_deb_max_line'].'&max_cred='.$l_prop['jrn_cred_max_line'].'&p_jrn='.$p_jrn.'"> Ajouter</A>';
00506   echo '</TD></TR></TABLE>';
00507 }
00508 /* function GetJrnProperty ($p_cn,$p_jrn) 
00509  * Purpose : Get the properties of a journal
00510  * 
00511  * parm : 
00512  *      - p_cn database connection
00513  *      - p_jrn the jrn id
00514  * gen :
00515  *      - none
00516  * return:
00517  *      - an array containing properties
00518  *
00519  */ 
00520 function GetJrnProperty($p_cn,$p_jrn) 
00521 {
00522   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select jrn_Def_id,jrn_def_name,jrn_def_class_deb,jrn_def_class_cred,jrn_def_type, 
00523                    jrn_deb_max_line,jrn_cred_max_line,jrn_def_ech,jrn_def_ech_lib,jrn_def_code,
00524                    jrn_def_fiche_deb,jrn_def_fiche_deb
00525                    from jrn_Def 
00526                       where jrn_def_id=$p_jrn");
00527   $Count=pg_NumRows($Res);
00528   if ( $Count == 0 ) {
00529     echo '<DIV="redcontent"><H2 class="error"> Paramètres journaux non trouvés</H2> </DIV>';
00530     return null;
00531   }
00532   return pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00533 }
00534 /* function GetJrnProp
00535  * Purpose : Get the properties of a journal
00536  * 
00537  * parm : 
00538  *      - p_dossier the folder id
00539  *      - p_jrn the jrn id
00540  * gen :
00541  *      - none
00542  * return:
00543  *      - an array containing properties
00544  *
00545  */ 
00546 function GetJrnProp($p_dossier,$p_jrn,$is_connected=0) 
00547 {
00548   if ( $is_connected == 0 ) 
00549     $cn=DbConnect($p_dossier);
00550   else
00551     $cn=$p_dossier;
00552 
00553   $Res=ExecSql($cn,"select jrn_Def_id,jrn_def_name,jrn_def_class_deb,jrn_def_class_cred,jrn_def_type, 
00554                    jrn_deb_max_line,jrn_cred_max_line,jrn_def_ech,jrn_def_ech_lib,jrn_def_code,
00555                    jrn_def_fiche_deb,jrn_def_fiche_deb
00556                    from jrn_Def 
00557                       where jrn_def_id=$p_jrn");
00558   $Count=pg_NumRows($Res);
00559   if ( $Count == 0 ) {
00560     echo '<DIV="redcontent"><H2 class="error"> Paramètres journaux non trouvés</H2> </DIV>';
00561     return null;
00562   }
00563   return pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00564 }
00565 /* function ViewJrn
00566  * Purpose : Vue des écritures comptables
00567  * 
00568  * parm : 
00569  *      - p_dossier,
00570  *      - p_user,
00571  *      - p_jrn
00572  *      - p_url for modif
00573  *      - array
00574  * gen :
00575  *      -
00576  * return:
00577  *      -
00578  *
00579  */ 
00580 function ViewJrn($p_dossier,$p_user,$p_jrn,$p_url,$p_array=null) {
00581   echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"function ViewJrn($p_dossier,$p_user,$p_jrn,$p_array=null) ");
00582   echo JS_VIEW_JRN_DETAIL;
00583   $db=sprintf("dossier%d",$p_dossier);
00584   $l_prop=GetJrnProp($p_dossier,$p_jrn);
00585   echo "<H2 class=\"info\">".$l_prop['jrn_def_name']."( ".$l_prop['jrn_def_code'].")"."</H2>";
00586   $cn=DbConnect($p_dossier);
00587   if ( $p_array == null) {
00588     include_once("preference.php");
00589     $l_periode=GetUserPeriode($cn,$p_user);
00590     $Res=ExecSql($cn,"select jr_id,j_id,jr_internal,to_char(j_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as j_date,
00591                        j_montant,j_poste,pcm_lib,j_grpt,j_debit,j_centralized,j_tech_per,
00592                        pcm_lib
00593                    from jrnx inner join tmp_pcmn on j_poste=pcm_val
00594                              inner join jrn on jr_grpt_id=j_grpt
00595                    where 
00596                    j_jrn_def=$p_jrn and j_tech_per=$l_periode
00597                    order by j_id,j_grpt,j_debit desc");
00598   } else {
00599     // Construction Query 
00600     foreach ( $p_array as $key=>$element) {
00601       ${"l_$key"}=$element;
00602       echo_debug ("l_$key $element");
00603     }
00604     $sql="select j_id,to_char(j_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as j_date,j_montant,j_poste,
00605                  pcm_lib,j_grpt,jr_id,j_debit,j_centralized,j_tech_per,jr_internal
00606                    from jrnx inner join tmp_pcmn on j_poste=pcm_val
00607                         inner join jrn on jr_grpt_id=j_grpt
00608                    where 
00609                    j_jrn_def=$p_jrn";
00610     $l_and="and ";
00611     if ( ereg("^[0-9]+$", $l_s_montant) || ereg ("^[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$", $l_s_montant) ) {
00612     $sql.=" and jr_montant $l_mont_sel $l_s_montant";
00613     }
00614     if ( isDate($l_date_start) != null ) {
00615       $sql.=$l_and." j_date >= to_date('".$l_date_start."','DD.MM.YYYY')";
00616     }
00617     if ( isDate($l_date_end) != null ) {
00618       $sql.=$l_and." j_date <= to_date('".$l_date_end."','DD.MM.YYYY')";
00619     }
00620     $l_s_comment=FormatString($l_s_comment);
00621     if ( $l_s_comment != null ) {
00622       $sql.=$l_and." upper(jr_comment) like upper('%".$l_s_comment."%') ";
00623     }
00624 
00625     $sql.=" order by j_id,j_grpt,j_debit desc";
00626     echo_debug ("search query is $sql");
00627     $Res=ExecSql($cn,$sql);
00628   }
00629   $MaxLine=pg_NumRows($Res);
00630   if ( $MaxLine == 0 ) return;
00631   $col_vide="<TD></TD>";
00632   echo '<TABLE ALIGN="center">';
00633   $l_id=0;
00634   for ( $i=0; $i < $MaxLine; $i++) {
00635     $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00636     if ( $l_line['j_debit'] == 't' ) {
00637       echo '<TR style="background-color:lightblue;">';
00638     }
00639     else {
00640       echo '<TR>';
00641     }
00642     if ( $l_id == $l_line['j_grpt'] ) {
00643       echo $col_vide.$col_vide.$col_vide;
00644     } else {
00645       echo "<TD>";
00646       echo $l_line['j_date'];
00647       echo "</TD>";
00648       
00649       
00650           echo "<TD>";
00651           if ( isset ($_GET["PHPSESSID"])  ) {
00652             $sessid=$_GET["PHPSESSID"];
00653           } else {
00654             $sessid=$_POST["PHPSESSID"];
00655           }
00656 
00657           list($z_type,$z_num,$num_op)=split("-",$l_line['jr_internal']);
00658           printf ('<INPUT TYPE="BUTTON" VALUE="%s" onClick="viewDetail(\'%s\',\'%s\')">', 
00659                   $num_op,$l_line['j_grpt'],$sessid);
00660           //      echo $num_op;
00661           echo "</TD>";
00662 
00663 
00664           // no modification only cancel of wrong op.
00665           echo '<TD class="mlltitle">';
00666           echo "<A class=\"mtitle\" HREF=$p_url?action=update&line=".$l_line['jr_id'].">";
00667           echo "M";
00668           echo "</A></TD>";
00669       $l_id=$l_line['j_grpt'];
00670     }
00671     if ($l_line['j_debit']=='f')
00672       echo $col_vide;
00673     
00674     echo '<TD>';
00675     echo $l_line['j_poste'];
00676     echo '</TD>';
00677 
00678     echo '<TD>';
00679     echo $l_line['pcm_lib'];
00680     echo '</TD>';
00681     echo $col_vide;
00682 
00683     echo '<TD>';
00684     echo $l_line['j_montant'];
00685     echo '</TD>';
00686 
00687     if ( $l_line['j_debit']=='t')
00688       echo $col_vide;
00689 
00690     echo "</TR>";
00691 
00692 
00693   }
00694   echo '</TABLE>';
00695 }
00696 /* function GetData
00697  * Purpose : Get data from jrnx where p_grpt=jrnx(j_grpt)
00698  * 
00699  * parm : 
00700  *      - connection
00701  *      - p_grpt
00702  * gen :
00703  *      - none
00704  * return:
00705  *      - return array
00706  *
00707  */ 
00708 function GetData ($p_cn,$p_grpt) {
00709   echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"GetData $p_cn $p_grpt");
00710   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select 
00711                         to_char(j_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as j_date,
00712                         j_text,
00713                         j_debit,
00714                         j_poste,
00715                         j_montant,
00716                         j_id,
00717                         jr_comment,
00718                         to_char(jr_ech,'DD.MM.YYYY') as jr_ech,
00719                         to_char(jr_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as jr_date,
00720                         jr_id,jr_internal,jr_def_id
00721                      from jrnx inner join jrn on j_grpt=jr_grpt_id where j_grpt=$p_grpt");
00722   $MaxLine=pg_NumRows($Res);
00723   if ( $MaxLine == 0 ) return null;
00724   $deb=0;$cred=0;
00725   for ( $i=0; $i < $MaxLine; $i++) {
00726     
00727     $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00728     $l_array['op_date']=$l_line['j_date'];
00729     if ( $l_line['j_debit'] == 't' ) {
00730       $l_class=sprintf("class_deb%d",$deb);
00731       $l_montant=sprintf("mont_deb%d",$deb);
00732       $l_text=sprintf("text_deb%d",$deb);
00733       $l_array[$l_class]=$l_line['j_poste'];
00734       $l_array[$l_montant]=$l_line['j_montant'];
00735       $l_array[$l_text]=$l_line['j_text'];
00736       $l_id=sprintf("op_deb%d",$deb);
00737       $l_array[$l_id]=$l_line['j_id'];
00738       $deb++;
00739     }
00740     if ( $l_line['j_debit'] == 'f' ) {
00741       $l_class=sprintf("class_cred%d",$cred);
00742       $l_montant=sprintf("mont_cred%d",$cred);
00743       $l_array[$l_class]=$l_line['j_poste'];
00744       $l_array[$l_montant]=$l_line['j_montant'];
00745       $l_id=sprintf("op_cred%d",$cred);
00746       $l_array[$l_id]=$l_line['j_id'];
00747       $l_text=sprintf("text_cred%d",$deb);
00748       $l_array[$l_text]=$l_line['j_text'];
00749 
00750       $cred++;
00751     }
00752     $l_array['jr_internal']=$l_line['jr_internal'];
00753     $l_array['comment']=$l_line['jr_comment'];
00754     $l_array['ech']=$l_line['jr_ech'];
00755     $l_array['jr_id']=$l_line['jr_id'];
00756     $l_array['jr_def_id']=$l_line['jr_def_id'];
00757    }
00758   return array($l_array,$deb,$cred);
00759 }

00778 /* function  GetInternal($p_cn,$p_id)
00779  * Purpose : Return the internal value
00780  * 
00781  * parm : 
00782  *      - p_cn database connection
00783  *      - p_id : jrn.jr_id
00784  * gen :
00785  *      - none
00786  * return:
00787  *      -  null si aucune valeur de trouvée
00788  *
00789  */ 
00790 function GetInternal($p_cn,$p_id) {
00791 
00792   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select jr_internal from jrn where jr_id=$p_id");
00793   if ( pg_NumRows($Res) == 0 ) return null;
00794   $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Res);
00795   return $l_line['jr_internal'];
00796 }

00798 /* function GetAmount
00799  * Purpose : return the sum of jrn where
00800  *            the internal_code is the p_id
00801  * 
00802  * parm : 
00803  *      - $p_cn database connection
00804  *  - p_id = jrn.jr_internal
00805  * gen :
00806  *      -
00807  * return:
00808  *      - number
00809  *
00810  */ 
00811 function GetAmount($p_cn,$p_id) {
00812   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select jr_montant from jrn where jr_internal='$p_id'");
00813   if (pg_NumRows($Res)==0) return -1;
00814   $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00815   return $l_line['jr_montant'];
00816 }
00817 /* function VerifData
00818  * Purpose : Verify the data before inserting or
00819  *           updating
00820  * 
00821  * parm : 
00822  *      - p_cn connection
00823  *      - p_array array with all the values
00824  *      - p_user
00825  * gen :
00826  *      - none
00827  * return:
00828  *      - errorcode or ok
00829  *
00830  */ 
00831 function VerifData($p_cn,$p_array,$p_user)
00832 {
00833   if ( ! isset ($p_cn) ||
00834        ! isset ($p_array)||
00835        ! isset ($p_user)||
00836        $p_array == null ){
00837     echo_error("JRN.PHP VerifData missing parameter");
00838     return BADPARM;
00839   }
00840   // Montre ce qu'on a encodé et demande vérif
00841   $next="";
00842   foreach ( $p_array as $name=>$element ) {
00843       echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"element $name -> $element ");
00844       // Sauve les données dans des variables
00845       ${"p_$name"}=$element;
00846     }
00847     // Verif Date
00848     if ( isDate($p_op_date) == null) {
00849       return BADDATE;
00850     }
00851     // userPref contient la periode par default
00852     $userPref=$p_user->GetPeriode();
00853     list ($l_date_start,$l_date_end)=GetPeriode($p_cn,$userPref);
00854 
00855     // Date dans la periode active
00856     echo_debug ("date start periode $l_date_start date fin periode $l_date_end date demandée $p_op_date");
00857     if ( cmpDate($p_op_date,$l_date_start)<0 || 
00858          cmpDate($p_op_date,$l_date_end)>0 )
00859       {
00860         return NOTPERIODE;
00861       }
00862     // Periode fermée 
00863     if ( PeriodeClosed ($p_cn,$userPref)=='t' )
00864       {
00865         return PERIODCLOSED;
00866       }
00867     $l_mont=0;
00868     if ( ! isset ($p_ech) ) $p_ech="";
00869 
00870     if ($p_ech!='' && isDate ( $p_ech) == null ){
00871       return INVALID_ECH;
00872     }
00873 
00874     $tot_deb= 0;
00875     $tot_cred= 0;
00876     for ( $i = 0; $i < $p_MaxCred; $i++) {
00877       if ( isset ( ${"p_mont_cred$i"} ))
00878         $tot_cred+=${"p_mont_cred$i"};
00879     }
00880     for ( $i = 0; $i < $p_MaxDeb; $i++) {
00881       if ( isset ( ${"p_mont_deb$i"} ))
00882         $tot_deb+=${"p_mont_deb$i"};
00883     }
00884     echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"Amont =      $tot_deb $tot_cred");
00885     if ( round($tot_deb,2) != round($tot_cred,2) ) { 
00886       return DIFF_AMOUNT;
00887     }
00888 
00889     return NOERROR;
00890 
00891 }
00892 /* function GetJrnName
00893  * Purpose : Return the name of the jrn
00894  * 
00895  * parm : 
00896  *      - p_cn connexion resource
00897  *      - jrn id
00898  * gen :
00899  *      - none
00900  * return:
00901  *      - string or null if not found
00902  *
00903  */ 
00904 function GetJrnName($p_cn,$p_id) {
00905   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select jrn_def_name from ".
00906                " jrn_def where jrn_def_id=".
00907                $p_id);
00908   $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00909   if ($Max==0) return null;
00910   $ret=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00911   return $ret['jrn_def_name'];
00912 }
00913 /* function NextJrn
00914  * Purpose :
00915  *         Get the number of the next jrn
00916  *         from the jrn_def.jrn_code
00917  * 
00918  * parm : 
00919  *      - $p_cn connection
00920  *      - $p_type jrn type
00921  * gen :
00922  *      - none
00923  * return:
00924  *      - string containing the next code
00925  *
00926  */ 
00927 function NextJrn($p_cn,$p_type)
00928 {
00929   $Ret=CountSql($p_cn,"select * from jrn_def where jrn_def_type='".$p_type."'");
00930   return $Ret+1; 
00931 }
00932 /* function     SetInternalCode
00933  * Purpose :
00934  * 
00935  * parm : 
00936  *      - $p_cn connection
00937  *      - $p_grpt id in jr_grpt_id
00938  *      - $p_jrn jrn id jrn_def_id
00939  *      - $p_dossier dossier id
00940  * gen :
00941  *      -
00942  * return:
00943  *      -
00944  *
00945  */ 
00946 function SetInternalCode($p_cn,$p_grpt,$p_jrn)
00947 {
00948   //$num=CountSql($p_cn,"select * from jrn where jr_def_id=$p_jrn and jr_internal != 'ANNULE'")+1;
00949   $num = NextSequence($p_cn,'s_internal');
00950   $num=strtoupper(hexdec($num));
00951   $atype=GetJrnProperty($p_cn,$p_jrn);
00952   $type=$atype['jrn_def_code'];
00953   $internal_code=sprintf("%d%s-%s",$_SESSION['g_dossier'],$type,$num);
00954   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"update jrn set jr_internal='".$internal_code."' where ".
00955                " jr_grpt_id = ".$p_grpt);
00956   return $internal_code;
00957 }
00958 /* function GetDataJrnJrid
00959  * Purpose : Get data from jrn and jrnx thanks the jr_id
00960  * 
00961  * parm : 
00962  *      - connection
00963  *      - p_jr_id (jrn.jr_id)
00964  * gen :
00965  *      - none
00966  * return:
00967  *      - return array
00968  *
00969  */ 
00970 function GetDataJrnJrId ($p_cn,$p_jr_id) {
00971   echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"GetDataJrn $p_cn $p_jr_id");
00972   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select 
00973                         j_text,
00974                         j_debit,
00975                         j_poste,
00976                        pcm_lib as vw_name,
00977                         j_montant,
00978                         jr_montant,
00979                         j_id,
00980                         jr_pj_name,
00981                         jr_grpt_id,
00982                         jr_comment,
00983                         to_char(jr_ech,'DD.MM.YYYY') as jr_ech,
00984                         to_char(jr_date,'DD.MM.YYYY') as jr_date,
00985                         jr_id,jr_internal, jr_rapt,jrn_def_type
00986                      from 
00987                           jrnx 
00988                         inner join jrn on j_grpt=jr_grpt_id 
00989                         inner join jrn_def on jrn_def.jrn_def_id=jrn.jr_def_id
00990                         left outer join tmp_pcmn on  j_poste=pcm_val
00991                       where 
00992                          jr_id=$p_jr_id 
00993                       order by j_debit desc");
00994   $MaxLine=pg_NumRows($Res);
00995   echo_debug('jrn.php',__LINE__,"Found $MaxLine lines");
00996   if ( $MaxLine == 0 ) return null;
00997 
00998   for ( $i=0; $i < $MaxLine; $i++) {
00999     $line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
01000     $array['j_debit']=$line['j_debit'];
01001     $array['vw_name']=$line['vw_name'];
01002     $array['jr_comment']=$line['jr_comment'];
01003     $array['j_montant']=$line['j_montant'];
01004     $array['jr_id']=$line['jr_id'];
01005     $array['jr_date']=$line['jr_date'];
01006     $array['jr_internal']=$line['jr_internal'];
01007     $array['j_poste']=$line['j_poste'];
01008     $array['jr_montant']=$line['jr_montant'];
01009     $array['jr_rapt']=$line['jr_rapt'];
01010     $array['jrn_def_type']=$line['jrn_def_type'];
01011     $array['jr_grpt_id']=$line['jr_grpt_id'];
01012     $array['jr_pj_name']=$line['jr_pj_name'];
01013     //    $array['']=$line[''];
01014 
01015     $ret_array[$i]=$array;
01016     }
01017   return $ret_array;
01018 }
